comments.en:
Japanese equivalent of CX4600.

Multi-function device: Printer, Scanner, Copier.

6-ink printing engine (CcMmYK, 3-pl drops). Maximum paper size A4/Letter/Legal.

Scanning should work with SANE using Epson's IScan or perhaps also with SANE's "epson" backend.

Copying should just work with the front panel of the device.

Consumables/Refills:
